from Crypto.Util.number import getPrime
from secret import falg
pad = lambda s:s + bytes([(len(s)-1)%16+1]*((len(s)-1)%16+1))

n = getPrime(128)**2 * getPrime(128)**2 * getPrime(128)**2 * getPrime(128)**2
e = 3

flag = pad(flag)
print(flag)
assert(len(flag) >= 48)
m = int.from_bytes(flag,'big')
c = pow(m,e,n)

print(f'n = {n}')
print(f'e = {e}')
print(f'c = {c}')
